meanings.sent1: Her ethicalness was evident in the way she always chose to do what was right.
meanings.sent2: The company's ethicalness was praised by the community for its fair treatment of employees.
meanings.sent3: Despite his mischievous nature, his ethicalness shone through when he returned the lost wallet.
meanings.sent4: The ethicalness of the decision to donate all profits to charity was truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The ethicalness of her actions left a lasting impression on everyone around her.

meanings.definition: The state of conforming to accepted standards of conduct.
meanings.sent1: The school's code of conduct emphasized the importance of ethicalness in all interactions.
meanings.sent2: In the courtroom, the judge ensured that ethicalness was maintained throughout the trial.
meanings.sent3: The ethicalness of the penguin wearing a tuxedo to the party brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: The ethicalness of the team's collaboration was like a well-choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: His ethicalness in following traffic rules made him a role model for other drivers.
